message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.MM, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with a mechanism to prevent pilot spoofing in multi-user OFDM systems, which involves coding and decoding techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory). The paper also deals with wireless communication systems, which suggests the category cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper proposes a security mechanism, which suggests the category cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves simulations, which suggests the category cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper proposes a joint channel estimation and identification mechanism, which suggests the category cs.SY (Systems and Control).
